title: OpenAI Gets Stake in Thrive Holdings, Adds to Circular Deals
description: OpenAI is taking an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings, an investment vehicle set up earlier this year by Thrive Capital, adding to a growing list of circular deals involving the ChatGPT maker and its backers.

title: Cyber Monday US Spending Growth Seen Lagging Europe Amid Tariffs
description: Cyber Monday spending will grow much more slowly in the US than Europe, a new phenomenon that reflects the impact of President Donald Trumpâ€™s trade war and aggressive interest rate cuts by the European Central Bank, according to an estimate released Monday by Salesforce Inc.

title: Supreme Court Questions $1 Billion Music Piracy Suit Against Cox
description: The US Supreme Court weighed giving internet providers a stronger shield from legal liability when customers pirate copyrighted works, questioning a $1 billion music industry copyright lawsuit against Cox Communications Inc.
